scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.holochain: npm run build:happ && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ"
scripts.start:happ: rimraf .hc* && RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate workdir/happ/team-mates.happ --run=8888 -a test-app network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack workdir/dna
